:visible-height.description: Displays the trigger scroll height of the back-to-top button
:visible-height.description_zh: 显示回到顶部按钮的触发滚动高度

target-container.description: A listening container for scrolling events

easing.description: The easing method of the scrolling animation, with optional values refer to BTween
easing.description_zh: 滚动动画的缓动方式，可选值参考 BTween

:duration.description: The duration of the scrolling animation
